entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonOptional attribute for properties that may or may not be present when serialized/deserialized. #74285
  • reference binding to null pointer caught by ubsan #74284
    7.0.0
  • Test failures with COMPlus_JitStackChecks=1 #74280
    7.0.0
  • Announcement: Extending API review process #74273
  • [CET Debugging] User mode APC's on Windows x64 with CET enabled can cause a debug session to crash #74271
    8.0.0
  • Ensure Vector64/128/256 are blocked for pass-by-value to P/Invoke in all scenarios #74269
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_34170/Runtime_34170/Runtime_34170.sh #74260
    7.0.0
  • dnSpy: Assertion failed '(varDsc->TypeGet() == TYP_I_IMPL) && lcl->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF)' #74259
    8.0.0
  • IntPtr and int/long assignment compatibility #74258
    Future
  • [R2R] Debug assert failing for condition that is definitely true #74253
  • Is it possible to create a x509Certificate2 with the CA, client.cert and client.key? #74250
    Future
  • [tvOS] XmlSerializerTests failing #74247
  • [iOS][MacCatalyst] iOS.Simulator.XmlSerializer_Deserialize.Test failing #74245
  • [tvOS] System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.Config.Tests failing #74244
  • TarFile.ExtractToDirectoryInternal() doesn't work sometimes with compressed archives #74242
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Generate d.ts file from JSExport attributes #74233
  • When will .NET support RFC 7232? #74232
  • `dotnet build --help` is slower than .NET6 #74227
  • Mono does not align Int128 types on correct boundaries when p/invoking or passing pointers to them to unmanaged code #74223
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbWeight == BB_ZERO_WEIGHT' in 'Castle.DynamicProxy.Contributors.ProxyInstanceContributor:ImplementProxyTargetAccessor(Castle.DynamicProxy.Generators.Emitters.ClassEmitter,Castle.DynamicProxy.Generators.Emitters.SimpleAST.FieldReference):this' during 'Invert loops' #74218
    7.0.0
  • Tar: behavior for symbolic links to directories #74214
    7.0.0
  • ABI for Int128 and UInt128 is incorrect with regards to native ABI for by value parameter passing #74209
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\valuetypes\\nullable\\castclass\\null\\castclass-null019\\castclass-null019.cmd #74206
    7.0.0
  • Consider enabling R2R when loading from a byte array on OSX #74203
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Regex different behavior on .NET 6 and 7 #74266
    7.0.0
  • `[U]Int128` alignment handling is in the wrong place #72206
    7.0.0
  • Is runtime.linux-x64.Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.ObjWriter necessary for source-build? #69611
    7.0.0
  • Rename 'easy' to 'good first issue' #74272
  • Broken system with Ubuntu 22.04 where Microsoft packages are partially replaced by Canonical packages #73764
  • Directory.CreateDirectory with UnixFileMode: behavior for missing parents #73899
    7.0.0
  • Examine uses of FP Zero for correctness #6055
    Future
  • Merge bounds check nodes #9808
    Future
  • JIT: Implement or eliminate GTF_REG_BIRTH #10418
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!comp->opts.compJitEarlyExpandMDArrays' in 'AA:Static2():System.Byte[,]' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #74128
    7.0.0
  • Prefer Span<T>.Clear() over Span<T>.Fill(default) #33813
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Logging filter for exception #74249
  • API proposal: Logging filter for exception #74248
  • Logging filter for exception type #36133
    Future
  • cannot validate certificate for 192.168.1.200 because it doesn't contain any IP SANs #74161
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json (U)Int128 related APIs #74139
    7.0.0
  • NegotiateAuthenticationKerberosTest failing on Android #74224
  • [API Proposal]: SelectMany simplify #74219
  • NativeAOT needs to understand SuppressTrimAnalysisWarnings #73926
    7.0.0
  • Avoid pinning OverlappedData objects #74212
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] ObjectStackAllocationTests is failing with `COMPlus_JitStress=8`. #57910
    8.0.0
  • Is it possible to add a method that kills the process tree? #74198
  • Dataflow analysis lockup compiling System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #73048
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Json_ToStream<MyEventsListerViewModel> #66464

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix per-call stack checks on x86 #74283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add guards around memcmp and memset to fix ubsan runtime errors. #74282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve performance of Tar library #74281
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable Int128 use in by value ABI scenarios, and fix field layout behavior #74279
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74277
    area-System.IO
  • Do not create `ADDR(HWI/SIMD)` in the inliner #74276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify some `ADDR`-related code; fix one bug #74274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Clean up EH routines #74270
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int on all configs #74265
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable failing runtime extra platforms tests #74264
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Unwrap exception when calling entrypoint #74263
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update Xunit to 2.4.2 #74262
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74261
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 7.0.0
  • Add functional custom JsonConverter tests for Int128/UInt128/Half #74254
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Mark `Unsafe.AsRef<T>(in T)` as `scoped`. #74252
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Remove AES and SubtleCrypto from WASM #74246
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [WASM] Fix deadlock when instantiating pthread worker pool #74243
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [WASM] Fix deadlock when instantiating pthread worker pool #74240
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add runs for release/7.0* on community architectures #74239
    area-Infrastructure
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Omit the JS sync context if threads are not enabled #74236
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Unwrap exception when calling entrypoint #74235
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Reduce allocation when options are passed to fetch #74230
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions #74226
    area-System.Transactions
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Add new javascript API types #74222
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't NativeAOT crossgen on ARM64 #74221
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add a way to suppress all trimming warnings #74220
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't track current field of state machines #74216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Update arcade to 7.0.0-beta.22418.4 #74210
    area-codeflow
  • Fix to skip adding self as next unrelated code list #74208
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74205
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Fix R2RDump in the presence of composite images #73979
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Convert more jit phases to opt into common post phase checks #74041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable Int128 use in by value ABI scenarios, and fix field layout behavior #74123
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix mirroring to internal repo clone. #74278
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Omit the JS sync context if threads are not enabled #74167
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74002
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Downgrade System.Reflection.Metadata in HostModel #74231
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [workloads] Shorten the workload name even more #74176
  • Clean up a TODO for ChainPolicyTests #74251
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Disable failing runtime extra platforms tests #74143
  • Dependency graph viewer README #74177
    documentation
  • [release/6.0] Bump arcade to 6.0.0-beta.22418.3 #74193
    blocking-release, area-codeflow
  • JIT: one-sided inference from unrelated predicates #72979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Try to make tooling happier. #74196
    area-System.Security
  • Remove AES and SubtleCrypto from WASM #74165
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • #52851 skip CurrentDirectorySet on MacCatalyst #74228
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • [Ppc64le] bug fixes #74131
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [Ppc64le] bug fixes #74058
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Reduce allocation when options are passed to fetch #74142
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Add new javascript API types #74166
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Don't NativeAOT crossgen on ARM64 #74211
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add a way to suppress all trimming warnings #74137
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix ObjectStackAllocationTests JitStress failure #74174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump timout in NativeAOT extra-platforms #74202
  • Don't track current field of state machines #74111
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Improve ControlledExecution tests #74186
    area-System.Runtime
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74045
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #73978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Simplify platform macro definitions in PAL #73530
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use the scoped keyword in LibraryImportGenerator #73479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Improve JitDisasm for top-level statements, expose DumpJittedMethods in Release #74090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix for Random failures in System.Numerics.Tests.modpowTest.ModPowAxiom test #74181
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0-rc1] net7.0 + net6.0 workload multitargeting changes #74018
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Backport crossgen2 fix for musl-libc #73986
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable matching constants for vectors that needs upper half to be save/restore #74192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Don't try to build PGO tools on platforms with no CoreCLR port. #74147
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix loading of R2R assemblies from byte arrays/streams #74118
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.WidenAsciiToUtf16 to x-plat intrinsics #73055
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [wasm] Use new javascript API in tests and samples #74153
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Allow SIMD-returning calls as arguments #74184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/6.0] Add Rocky Linux RIDs (#74159) #74164
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] App does not Run as a service in a Windows Container #74188
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.x
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Test infrastructure integration #1963

Merged

  • Validation for RuntimeFunctions and change to unwindinfo #1960

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • With .NET 7, unable to repair deleted files after executing "dotnet workload repair" on Mac #27276

Closed

  • Self-contained publish/build error #21677

PullRequests

Created

  • Update our helix pre-download code to try to pre-download for non-windows legs as well. #27306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove js-module-crypto handling in the SDK #27303
  • Switch localization to 7.0.1xx release branch #27296
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27280
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Migrated to newest version of `FluentAssertions` #27132
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #27250
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dotnet test --blame parameters to validate incoming values, and update help #26963
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27245
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1954984 #27252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • added typo correction for `dotnet new` instantiate #27265
    area: dotnet new
  • Remove custom logic of fetching dotnet dir #26851
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Quote file paths for the BrotliCompress tool #27213
    Area-WebSDK
  • dotnet new: switched telemetry to use `TelemetryEventEntry` #27223
    area: dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27241
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add solution filter for template engine #27229
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [23250] - dotnet test boolean flags options fixed #27262
    Area-DotNet Test

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • String-based enums #2849
  • [Proposal]: Compound assignment in object initializer and `with` expression #5176

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inline rename stops updating the buffer live if you temporarily rename to 'in' #63493
  • CS0540 partial type with generic base does not implement interface #63490
    17.4
  • Track 'default' nullability for `NotNull` attribute #63488

Closed

  • Regression in VS 2022 17.3 Preview 3 from Preview 2 when using a ref struct inside of iterator block #62973
    17.4
  • SyntaxProvider in incremental source generators caches a lot of symbols for large solutions #62674
    C# 12.0
  • SourceGenerators using RegisterPostInitializationOutput break Wpf projects #63489
  • LangVersion 10 does not find better matching extension method. #63487
  • Quick fix is suggesting that I make properties that access instance data static #63466
    17.4
  • Incorrectly reporting CA1822: Member can be marked static #63429

PullRequests

Created

  • Cherry-pick 62946 to 17.3 #63495
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Support changing return types of methods #63486
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #63484
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionRemoved #63458
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused GetLanguageName methods #63358
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63492
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63406
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Regression test for ref struct in iterator #63415
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove explicit ownership of LiveShare #63491
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Implement IAttributeOperation (#59369)" #63485
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix regression in analyzer partial analysis state tracking #63468
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • ConvertToRecord: Property and Method analysis #63320
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Inline local in Program.Main refactoring #63451
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add assert back #63437
    Area-Compilers, Community

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Specify targets when loading MSBuildWorkspace #61391
    Area-IDE
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Constructor ordering, defaults, and overloads #63371
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Editorconfig valueholder #63483
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused argument #63454
    Area-IDE
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Improve cross-project add-using results #63449
    Area-IDE
  • Move symbol-cache incremental-analyzer out of oop. #63438
    Area-IDE
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable new inline rename by default #62992
    Area-IDE
  • Move Windows builds to new images #63482
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use custom binary serialization for output cache entries #43415
  • Ignore output cache entries with delimiters in their keys #43414
  • Native building project with Microsoft Identity included, failing on System.Net.Quic #43411
  • Quarantine VariableMultipleStreamsInSequence_Success-500-True #43409
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #43405
  • Test/Validation for handling of w3.org redirect changes #43404
  • Set Default Page not working #43401
  • When I use EditForm with a model in a .NET MAUI Blazor, I get an error stating "EditForm requires either a Model parameter, or an EditContext parameter, please provide one of these." #43400
  • Blazor WebAssembly App with user accounts won't run in IIS #43399
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server does not dispose the created host thus could hang/fail the build process #43395
  • SignalR doesn't always reliable detect TCP/IP issues #43392
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server ignores minimal API endpoints #43391
  • Unobserved task exception in SignalR C# client #43389
  • Configure parameter binding #43386
  • What is the application that I have to allow in the firewall for a gRPC hosted in an ASP Core application? #43393
  • Perf improvement: mvc #43385
  • Returning SignOutResult produces an incorrectly formatted return URL #43383
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Add Output Caching middleware #41955
    7.0-rc1
  • localhost connection refused #43215
  • Code cleanup: Removing a superfluous switch block in Kestrel/Core #43328
  • Create Angular/React 7.0/6.0 project and use the command line to run project, the browser page always displays "Launching the spa proxy...“. #43335
  • Scaffolding Identity breaks ApplicationDbContext #42947
  • [Blazor] HttpPost with StreamContent reads whole file into memory #43388
  • Reload Blazor UI #43370
  • Restore and build only for specific feature areas #38533
    7.0-rc1
  • SignalR client-to-server streaming method on Hub not recognized as streaming unless return type contains stream parameter #43347
  • Make "NonDisposableStream" as public. #43362
  • Have a parameter to make NavigationManager navigate in a way similar to JavaScript location.replace method #43381
  • Error MSB6006: "dotnet.exe" exited with code 1 #43366
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #43322
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #43338
  • OperationCanceledException thrown from Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.ConfigurationManager.GetConfigurationAsync while trying to get Jwt tokens #43220
  • Add a server side buffer limit #43093
  • EndpointFilter better handling for IActionResult #43369

PullRequests

Created

  • Strip Content-Length: 0 from responses that should not have a Content-Length #43417
    area-runtime
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43413
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43412
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Retry VariableMultipleStreamsInSequence test #43410
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix URL building for SPA proxying #43407
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • Stop overriding MicrosoftNetCompilersToolsetVersion #43403
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Make Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger experimental #43384
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Support LF request line terminator in HttpParser #43202
    area-runtime
  • Copy invocation handler list in Java client #43402
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java, 7.0-rc1
  • Code cleanup: Removing a superfluous switch block #43372
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43336
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43354
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [7.0-rc1] Fix PopulateCertificatesFromStore on macOS to only return store certs #43358
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Register authz middleware for Blazor Server IndAuth #43375
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix GET_ConnectionsMakingMultipleRequests_AllSuccess #43382
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: Test abort at end of request #43183
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Hot reload: Acknowledge Blazor component parameter removal #43418
    area-blazor, feature-hot-reload
  • WebTransport interfaces require preview features #43419
    area-runtime
  • Better support for HTTP/2 in SignalR .NET client #42817
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, blog-candidate
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • Require CancellationToken for client results (and fix cancel closing connection) #43249
    area-signalr
  • Remove use of Expression.Constant in RequestDelegateFactory #43380
    area-runtime
  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Tracking] Consider renaming "💡help wanted" and "💡good first issue" labels #9559
  • Cannot set Editor Text Using MVVM #9556
  • Unable to debug native Android libraries #9555
  • ZIndex Xaml Markup Causes Crash on Release Build but Not Debug #9554
  • Changing button background removes hover and touch down effects on Windows #9552
  • Adding injected Pages to a TabbedView #9551
  • MAUI iOS doesn't work on EFCore 7 , but windows and android works #9550
  • QueryParametr does not passd into ViewModel when BindingContext is defined inside xaml by RelativeSource binding on page. #9549
  • LayoutCompression default true for possible controls #9548
  • [Windows] Msix creation failed for an application with a custom library referred directly #9547
  • [Windows] When use a TabbedPage as App.Mainpage, On Windows the Tabbar disappear when window lost the Focus #9546
  • Flex Layout -> BindableLayout not working after ItemsSource changed in new vs preview version #9544
  • Adding a WCF Connected Service: The target framework '$(TargetFrameworks)' is not supported #9543
  • Custom control inheriting from Border doesn't update background on iOS using a trigger without stroke being set #9542
  • get error while installing .net maui #9541
  • System.AccessViolationException when using SwipeView in a CollectionView on Windows - back again #9540
  • Shadow with minus offset clipped left and top on Android #9539
  • We need controls like WPF frame #9538
  • Server-side rendering support #9537
  • Incorrect image orientation using MediaPicker CapturePhoto on iOS #9535
  • Blazor Hybrid app cashing on physical iOS device, but nowhere else #9533

Closed

  • Missing LifeCycle events for SceneDelegate on iOS and MacCatalyst #9476
    .NET 7
  • [ios] Native SVG bundle assets arent copied as part of "EnableDefaultMauiItems" #4862
    Backlog
  • Image not displaying in .NET MAUI Mac Catalyst #9536
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.manifest-6.0.300.msi.x64::6.0.9 is not found in NuGet feeds" #9486

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove GetEffectiveFlowDirection and defer flow direction handling to platforms #9558
  • Fix GC issues and cancel button visibility #9557
  • [iOS] Fix updating Border Background using VisualStateManager #9553
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22403.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22418.3 #9545
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Get the Mac Catalyst device tests running #9534
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/testing

Merged

  • Wire up scene life cycle events #9525

Updated

  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Simplify ShellItem Parenting #9221
    area/shell 🐢, .NET 7
  • Propagate semantic properties from FlyoutItem #9270
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 7 Planning
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9509
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr5
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9508
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 7.0-rc1
  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477
    partner/winui, do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Implement SkiaImage Save #9125
    area/drawing ✏️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Avoid repeated visitation in SqlTranslator #28796
  • Way to get seeds from sql file? #28792
  • Strings.PlatformNotSupported_DataSqlClient After Upgrade from Ubuntu 20.04 LTS to 22.04 LTS #28788
  • `dotnet-ef database update` fails with PlatformNotSupported on Fedora Linux #28786
  • When you run "dotnet ef migrations add Blogs" in command prompt, you get an error: "your startup project doesn't reference Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design." #28785
  • Do we still need this? #28783

Closed

  • Implement TagWith for ExecuteUpdate and DeleteUpdate #28690
    7.0.0
  • ExecuteUpdate: Add EF.Default #28660
    7.0.0
  • Bind member on result of single entity result subquery #28752
    7.0.0
  • ExecuteDelete with optional reference navigation in filter fails with SQLite #28745
    7.0.0-rc1
  • Exception when translating GroupBy-FirstOrDefault-Contains on entity #28524
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Update formatting of Update command #28797
    auto-merge
  • Query: API review changes #28795

Merged

  • Scaffolding: Address API Review feedback #28794
  • Metadata changes from the API review #28793
    tell-mode
  • ExecuteDelete: Always generate Any form #28781
  • ExecuteUpdate: Implement support for DEFAULT #28784
  • Add support for TagWith on ExecuteDelete/Update #28782

Updated

  • Stop scaffolding DbSet initializers #28684
